title: Trial By Fire Trailer - Total War: WARHAMMER III
author: Total War
description:
One side forged by the anvil of ice. The other rising from the raging fires. Blood for the Blood God! Skulls for the Skull Throne! Kislev.

Pre-purchase from CA (Steam & Epic): https://store.warhammer3.totalwar.com
Pre-purchase on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1142710
Pre-purchase on Epic: https://www.epicgames.com/store/product/total-war-warhammer-3
Any questions? Check out the FAQ: https://www.totalwar.com/blog/total-war-warhammer-iii-faq

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

#TotalWar #WARHAMMERIII #WHIII #WH3 #Khorne #Kislev #TrialByFire

localize.description:
一方は氷の金床で鍛えられ もう一方は荒れ狂う火の中から立ち上がる。血は血神のために！スカルスローンのためのスカル！Kislev.

CAからの先行購入（Steam & Epic）： https://store.warhammer3.totalwar.com
Steamでの事前購入： https://store.steampowered.com/app/1142710
Epicでの事前購入： https://www.epicgames.com/store/product/total-war-warhammer-3
質問はありますか？FAQをご覧ください: https://www.totalwar.com/blog/total-war-warhammer-iii-faq

localize.description:
一边是由冰的铁砧锻造而成。另一面从熊熊烈火中升起。鲜血献给血神! 骷髅王座的头骨! 基斯列夫。

从CA（Steam和Epic）预购：https://store.warhammer3.totalwar.com
在Steam上预购：https://store.steampowered.com/app/1142710
在Epic网站预购：https://www.epicgames.com/store/product/total-war-warhammer-3
